name: Font Utilization for Some Sites
description: Utilize some sites with Microsoft Yahei, Microsoft JHenghei Fonts.
css:
@-moz-document
domain("15k.cc"),
domain("5i33.com"),
domain("acfun.tv"),
domain("ali213.net"),
domain("appinn.com"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("bangumi.tv"),
domain("bbxsw.com"),
domain("bgm.tv"),
domain("bilibili.tv"),
domain("cnbeta.com"),
domain("comicdd.com"),
domain("csdn.net"),
domain("dbank.com"),
domain("dmm.hk"),
domain("dudukan.net"),
domain("gamersky.com"),
domain("google.com"),
domain("htcplayer.com"),
domain("huobook.com"),
domain("iqshw.com"),
domain("jumpcn.com"),
domain("ktxp.com"),
domain("langlangshu.com"),
domain("linuxtoy.org"),
domain("moe.fm"),
domain("moefou.org"),
domain("moka123.com"),
domain("portablesoft.org"),
domain("qq.com"),
domain("qqext.com"),
domain("ranwen.cc"),
domain("ranwenba.net"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("shuoshuo520.com"),
domain("sodu.org"),
domain("sodu.tv"),
domain("tsdm.net"),
domain("tsxs.net"),
domain("uuu9.com"),
domain("wjxs8.com"),
domain("xiaoshuo110.com"),
domain("xunlei.com"),
domain("zongheng.com")
{
    * {
        font-family: "Segoe UI", "Microsoft Yahei" !important;
    }
    pre, code, kbd, samp, var {
        font-family: "Courier New", "Microsoft Yahei", monospace !important;
    }
}

@-moz-document
domain("bocmacau.com"),
domain("dmhy.org"),
domain("facebook.com"),
domain("happymacao.com"),
domain("smg.gov.mo"),
domain("umac.mo")
{
    * {
        font-family: "Segoe UI", "Microsoft JHenghei" !important;
    }
    pre, code, kbd, samp, var {
        font-family: "Courier New", "Microsoft JHenghei", monospace !important;
    }
}
